title: POLONEZ AUTODRIVE
description: A synthwave-style 3D coloring-book like animation with real-time model and color customization of the scene via a built-in GUI. Built with creativity and models from 3D Studio Max. Now includes a beta overtaking mini-game.

title: Poemz [WIP]
description: Fullstack application on MERN stack using GraphQL, featuring basic web app functionality and user authentication. Main purpose of this project was to focus on backend development to learn more about GraphQL. Still work in progress, more info coming soon.

title: MSKORUS - my porftolio
technos: Next.js • TypeScript • TailwindCSS • React Three Fiber • Blender
description: Single page portfolio website with 3D scene and built-in web (HTML & CSS) version of resume. Hero scene is made in Blender and converted to React Three Fiber JSX components for better itneractivity. Pure React Three Fiber and web experiments battleground.

title: Yet Another Weather App
technos: React • JavaScript • Sass • Vanta.js • Open-Meteo API
description: Another `weather application`, but built slightly differently. Weather informations are displayed for the selected city or by geolocation of the user, and the interface has been enriched with additional possibilities to interact with displayed weather data and background. Lately, API chaged from OpenWeather to Open-Meteo. Unfortunately, still desktop only.
